modName: Intro video replacer - New to Modding and keep Crashing
summary: Replace the bethesda logo intro video into something shorter and fun!
descriptionHtml:
#notes - it's not gonna crash your game, i just can't think a better title!


Replace the bethesda logo intro video into something shorter and fun!
i made this for my friend who is new to using mods, but keep crashing his game xD


== Installation ==

Place the downloaded 'BGS_Logo.bik' to your Skyrim/Data/Video
author: lazulio
